con:testStep.name: ReadMe
con:testStep.con:description:
This suite validates Inspection log when a Bank Employee Searches transaction using Debit/Credit accountNumber.
PreCondtion: 1. CoSng and proxifier must be connected 2.Select the env (D2,D4 or any other) 3. Goto Project Property and update below property for respective env EnvIP (Ex -10.246.89.107:23621) UserName (Ex-e211732) Port (ex -22) Password (ex -) EOSHost (Ex - 10.246.89.107) ForeignAccountCID (ex-55057203187) ForeignAccountNumber (ex - 36281079039)
Steps Followed: 1. Perform a Read/Search using a BankEmployee as user 2. Login to EOS server using Groovy file ServerConnect.groovy(Groovy file must be in ${projectDir}\InspectionLogging\scripts folder) 3. Goto folder '/eos/env/pin/i1/logs/pin' --> where env = d4 or d2 and any enviornment folder 4. Read Inspcetion.log file using grep command "grep -i -E '${orgid}.*${customerid}.*(${accountNumber}|${creditAccountNumber}).*${inspectionSource}.*${inspectionSystem}.*${userID}.*${serviceFunction}.*(${nextTime}).*${serviceDescription}' inspection.log" 5.Verify that all the details are logged correctly
